data.text: @brenobonfi Hello, in order to assist your query send us via DM the reservation code (6 capital letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of one of the passengers. We will be waiting for your response. Regards.
@_ynnhoJ Hello, we've sent you a reply via DM. Kind regards.

@Fabisx123Costa Hello, we apologize for the delay on responding to your message. In order to provide you further assistance with this situation and as part of our policy of privacy let us know via DM the reservation code/ticket number along with the full passenger's name. Kind regards.

If you have a flight booked between March 17th and May 31st, 2020, within or to countries with border closure restrictions and/or state of emergency, you can reschedule your flight directly at https://t.co/GupT3buwW8. Find out more information at https://t.co/WqLwdCT01e https://t.co/RTFtgf9WnP
@NetsTrash Hello, we've sent you a reply via DM. Kind regards.
@Mkbonani We replied to the message you sent via DM.
@nicaensj Hello, we sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.
@JGreenspaNY Jared, we have sent you an answer via DM. Regards.
@KarlstromSigrid We replied to the message you sent via DM.
@Nati_Agostinho Bear in mind that we can assist you through this mean too, in order to continue provide us via DM your reservation code or ticket number and full name of the passengers. Kind regards.
@danidvr Olá Dani, boa noite. Tivemos uma captura tardia de sua mensagem. Ainda podemos te auxiliar? Estamos à disposição.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @Bethg423 Hello, we are sorry for the delay, bear in mind that due to the Coronavirus and the current global health situation we have a high demand in our cases, let us know if you still require our assistance, bear in mind that we are here to help you. Kind regards.

@Nati_Agostinho Hello, in order to assist you provide us via DM your reservation code or ticket number and full name of the passenger, also let us know in which language would you prefer to get assistance, we will be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.
@b_arthurs_tunic Hello, we sent you a message via DM. Regards.

@JGreenspaNY Hello, we do apologize for the long time to answer. If you still need our assistance. Please send us via DM, the complete passenger's name and booking code. We look forward to your reply. Regards.

If you purchased your ticket through a travel agency, please contact them to request any changes. Learn more about our flexibility policies for COVID-19 by visiting: https://t.co/WqLwdCT01e https://t.co/p2wfnUVCJA

@jojolezama98 Hi, you can verify our protection options through the link below: https://t.co/Xxbqna6nOy. For further assistance, let us know via DM your reservation code and the full name of one of the passengers. We will be waiting for your response.
@nportmannphelps Hi, to assist you, please give us via DM your booking code or ticket number, and the full name of the passenger. We'll be waiting for your response.

@wagnerprado7 Wagner, como seu bilhete foi emitida por um agência de viagens, o reembolso deve ser solicitado diretamente com a emissora do bilhete. Assim orientamos que entre em contato com a agência emissora e verifique os termos e condições para o cancelamento da viagem.

data.text: #AtentionPassengers: Due to the high demand of calls to our contact center, we are prioritizing passengers who fly in the next 48 hs. We appreciate your understanding. For measures regarding COVID-19 refer to https://t.co/4Cec80HaDK https://t.co/9WWSCs9wJX

@SlaboeZ Hello, we can assist you through this mean, please let us know further details about your inquire, and send us via DM your booking code or ticket number, and the passenger's full name. Regards.
@KarlstromSigrid Hi, to assist you, please give us via DM your booking code or ticket number, as well as the full name of the passenger. We'll be waiting for your response.

@BenJWeinberg Hi, our flights in this route for this week are currently on time. If you wish to book flights, you can do so here: https://t.co/4QfegoB4UU. Prices are subject to the availability for the route and dates you choose. We look forward to assisting you with future requests. Regards.

If you have a canceled flight, restrictions due to border closures, a state of emergency or you want to change your travel date. Visit https://t.co/WqLwdCT01e for more information. https://t.co/puIA9A3zPm
@Rimigod Ricardo, we've sent you information through DM. Regards.
@renanscalet Bom dia, Renan! Você conseguiu resolver sua questão? Caso não, informe por inbox seu código de reserva para analisarmos.

@JMOsound Hi, we apologize for the delay responding to your request. In order to provide you further assistance, let us know your booking reference/ticket number along with the full passenger's name via DM. We'll be expecting your reply in order to provide you further assistance. Regards.

@gregpr88 Hello, we're still working on your case, and we left an internal follow up in order to provide you with an answer as soon as possible, some cases take longer than expected, but rest assured that we're working on it. Once we have any update, we'll let you know. Regards.

@peacelove654 Hola, sí hay restricciones para vuelos internacionales desde/hacia Chile. Asimismo, debido al cierre de frontera en Chile, contamos con excepciones para proteger a nuestros pasajeros. Si cuentas con un código de reserva, envíanoslo junto con tu nombre completo vía DM. Saludos.

@ShubhdaHirawat Hello, we do apologize for the long time we took to answer. In this case due to the flight was book with the mentioned agency, you have to validate the refund directly with them, because the booking code doesn't belong us. Regards.
@MichaelPageWx Hi, if you need assistance just let us know through a DM. You can always send us your formal claims through this link: https://t.co/NWjjB33Ux3. Regards.

@todd_libby Hi, due to the worldwide situation we have updated our protection options, in order to provide you further assistance, let us know via DM the reservation code and one of the passengers' full name. We will be waiting for your response. Regards.
@carlossoto Hi, you can send us the booking code and the full name of the passengers through a DM to verify the information and provide assistance. We will await your reply.
@SsPetProject Hello Shirley, to assist you please let us know your reservation code or ticket number, and full name of the passenger. We'll be waiting for your response. Regards.
@cfigueredo12 Hello, we have sent you a message via DM. Kindly regards.
@JimmyRosales22 We sent you a message. Regards.

@degarrison Hi, the phone menu will list the options and you can select the one that fits your situation. We can assist you with your request. To do so, please give us via DM your booking code or ticket number, and the full name of the passenger. We'll be waiting for your response.
@JimmyRosales22 Hello, we have sent you a message. Regards.
@giacomo77777 Hi, we've sent you a response by DM. Regards.
@RealDuva Hello, we have sent you an answer via DM. Regards.
@BostonPhotoDiva Hello, take into consideration all tickets are subject to cabin availability, variation, and proximity of the flight. Regards.

@jfuentescl Hola Joel, para asistirte, indícanos vía DM tu código de reserva o número de boleto y el nombre completo del pasajero. Adicionalmente, indícanos en qué idioma deseas ser atendido. Quedamos atentos a esta información.
@daria_kaboli We have sent you a message via DM. Kindly regards.
@shybk8 Hello Shai, if you still need assistance, please let us know your reservation code or ticket number, the passenger's full name and further information about your situation. Regards.
@jfennho1 We've replied through DM, regards.

@pashut_stam We've replied through DM, regards.
@followalena Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.

@noyoniidea Hola, ten en cuenta que todo cambio o devolución es bajo regulaciones. Asimismo, contamos con algunas excepciones debido al acontecimiento mundial. Para mayor detalle envianos vía DM tu código de reserva y/o número de ticket y nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.

@Moluv7531Mo Hi, we can assist you through this means. Please, send us more details on your requirement, your booking code or ticket number and passenger's full name by DM. We'll look forward to your response. Regards.
@pashut_stam Hi, yes, we can assist you. Please, send us your booking code or ticket number alongside passenger's full name by DM. We'll be waiting for it. Regards.
@Pedro1Natal Hello, for security policies, we suggest you to delete the information in the post, and please send it through DM. We look forward to your reply. Regards.
@SenseiTsai We sent you a private message. Regards.
@Globalpal8 We sent you a message through DM. Regards.
@MorganaSanchez Hi, we can assist you through this means, too. Please, send us your booking code or ticket number alongside your full name by DM. We'll look forward to your response. Regards.
@SenseiTsai We sent you a DM. Regards.
@SenseiTsai Hi, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@Openvector We answered your DM. Regards.
@KBowen21 Hi, send us the booking code and the full name of the passengers through a DM to verify the information and give you assistance. Regards.
@Pedro1Natal Hello Pedro, in order to provide you better assistance and if you have a reservation code, please let us know the booking code or ticket number, and the passenger's full name. Regards.
@Globalpal8 Hello, in order to assist you, please send us through DM your booking code and ticket number. We will be awaiting for your response. Regards.
@Roberto_Vas44 Hello, we've sent you a reply through DM. Regards.
@MarikoBurgin Hello, in order to assist you, please send us via DM your complete name and booking code or ticket number. We will await your response. Regards.

@Openvector Hi, send us your booking code and the full name of the passengers through a DM with more details about the situation to verify the information and give you assistance. We await your reply.
@_romualdoamaral Romualdo, nos informe o código da sua reserva por DM. Aguardamos seu retorno.
@usa_jelly Hi, we can assist you in English, Spanish or Portuguese, tell us the language in which you want to be assisted and your booking code through a DM. Regards.
@marylurdysh We've replied through DM, regards.

data.text: #AtentionPassengers 📢 : Due to the high demand of calls to our contact center, we are prioritizing passengers who fly in the next 48 hs. We appreciate your understanding. For measures regarding COVID-19 refer to https://t.co/WqLwdCT01e

#AtenciónPasajeros 📢 : Debido a la alta demanda de llamadas al contact center, estamos priorizando la atención de los pasajeros que vuelan en las próximas 48 hs. Agradecemos tu comprensión. Para medidas frente al COVID-19 consulta en https://t.co/4Cec80pzMc

@Isabell57466707 Hi, if the flight is on a different ticket that the one with our flights, you will need to check-in and dispatch your baggage again. You can send us your booking code or ticket numbers through a DM to verify it. You can tell us the language in which you want assistance. Regards.

@nualanualanua Hi, through this means we can assist you. Please provide via DM the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your reply.

@alanvthompson Hi, through this means we can assist you. Please provide via DM your booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/lat name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your reply.
@daria_kaboli Hello, in order to give more information and assist you, please send us through DM your complete name and reservation code or ticket number. We will await for your comments. Regards.
@marylurdysh We replied through DM.
@jfennho1 Hi, we answered your DM. Regards.
@ritesh_ahuja90 Hi, send us your full name and booking code through a DM to verify the information. We await your reply.

@theanimexpert Hola, con la finalidad de asistirte, bríndanos vía DM, el código de reserva (6 letras) y/o el número de ticket (13 dígitos), validando nombre y apellido de uno de los pasajeros. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@PameCarolinaa We have requested information via e-mail. Regards.
@marylurdysh We sent you more information via DM.
@germibh We hope to assist you in another opportunity. Regards.
@germibh Hello, indicate us how can we help you with your requirement. We will await for your response. Regards.

data.text: @followalena Hello, remember that you can access to your check-in process 48 hours before your flight through this link: https://t.co/RCIOPeWP5s. If your have another request, please send us via DM your booking code or ticket number and your full name. Regards.
